page.title: 09THE DISTRICT SPORTS
page.content: Yesterday, we had a District Sports day at Mount Carmel school. 7 schools were taking part competing against each other,St.Stevens,St.Georges, Mount Carmel,Holyoaksfield,Batchely, St.Lukes and Webheath. There were 36 races altogether, sprint,three-legged, egg and spoon,hurdle,dressing-up, obstacle,hoop bowling, and relays. The field had been marked put in lanes so that everyone knew where they had to run. The first races were sprints followed by the egg and spoon in which we had to get a ball(the egg) on the spoon and get to the finishing line without dropping it over a distance of 80metres. After the 22nd. race there was an interval of 10 mins. when we all had a drink of squash. All the schools had there own area to sit in. The children who had gained 1st,2nd,or 3rd places were awarded a certificate.
